title: Catherine Zeta-Jones looks younger than her 50 years in very feminine light blue summer dress...
text:
Catherine Zeta-Jones looked much younger than her 50 years on Sunday evening.

The Mask Of Zorro actress appeared to be ready for her closeup in a very feminine light blue dress that not only showed off her decolletage but also her toned legs.

The siren, who is wed to Basic Instinct actor Michael Douglas, 75, was exiting The Grill On The Alley in Beverly Hills alone.

A summer vibe in the fall: Catherine Zeta-Jones looked much younger than her 50 years on Sunday evening. The Mask Of Zorro actress appeared to be ready for her closeup in a very feminine light blue dress

The Oscar-winning Chicago actress may have picked her dress up in Spain as she often spends time there with Michael.

The beauty added pointy beige heels and carried an ivory Chanel purse with a gold chain while showing off a light pink manicure.

Her long raven hair was partially up, making the most of her large diamond hoop earrings.

A man opened the door for her and another woman followed, though it is not certain if they dined together.

Fancy: The Oscar winning Chicago actress may have picked her dress up in Spain as she often spends time there with Michael. The beauty added pointy beige heels and carried an ivory purse with a gold chain

Bling it on baby: Her long raven hair was partially up, showing off diamond hoop earrings.

Two weeks ago she was the best dressed at the annual Emmy Awards in Los Angeles.

The dancer from Wales had on a fuchsia gown that made the most of her slender figure.

And on her arm was the dapper Douglas, who has made over three dozen movies.

This comes after the two celebrated their birthdays, which fall on the same day.

A winner: Two weeks ago she was the best dressed at the annual Emmy Awards in Los Angeles. The dancer from Wales had on a pink/red gown that made the most of her slender figure. And on her arm was the dapper Douglas, who has made over three dozen movies

They attended a big party to ring in another year.

Catherine shared an video of the DJ paying tribute to Michael by playing Thiago Brava and João Brasil's 2016 hit Nunca Mais Eu Vou Dormir (I'll Never Sleep Again), yelling the actor's name in lyric breaks.

The actress showed her main man - and herself - some birthday love on the social media site.

'Happy Birthday to me, Happy Birthday to me, Happy Birthday to me, my husband Michael Douglas! and anyone else who was conceived around Christmas or New Years,' she captioned a fun Instagram video of Michael. 'Happy birthday to all.'

Having fun: Michael posted this snap , captioned, 'Golfing with my ❤️ on the big birthday!'

He returned the favor, by posting a snap of their wedding day, captioned: 'Happy Birthday my darling! I love you so much and I cannot wait to celebrate our special day together!'

The couple tied the knot in November 2000 and share two children together: son Dylan, 19, and daughter Carys, 16.

The previous evening they had a quiet family dinner with Michael's dad, 102-year-old Hollywood legend Kirk Douglas.
description: The siren, who is wed to Basic Instinct actor Michael Douglas, 75, was exiting The Grill in Beverly Hills alone. She was last seem in NYC, then before that the Emmys.
